description.en: Bitindi Chain (Bitindi) is a decentralized, high-efficiency, and energy-saving layer-1 public chain. It is compatible with smart contracts and supports high- performance transactions. The endogenous token of Bitindi is $BNI and it adopts the BPoS consensus mechanism. Bitindi will continue to onboard billions of users to ultra-fast transactions, tiny fees, easy-to-use apps, and is environmentally friendliness.
